pages.title: Freakshow
pages.text: The Freakshow, their names come from thier amalgamated

properties. $(br)$(br) This creature has almost every creature I have witnessed's properties, the eyes of the Soul Arachnid, the torso of the Skeletal Freak, the tendrils from the Warp, and the sporeshrooms from the Fungal Fiend. $(br)$(br) It's one thing to have two separate characters having the same parasite, it's another to have a single mind with ALL OF THEM. I should keep my distance and make sure none of this creature's properties become my own.
